about.title: Professional legal service with a personal approach
about.p1: The office provides legal and notarial services with emphasis on precision, accessibility and clear communication at every step.
about.p2: Matters are handled with practical planning, accurate documentation, and close follow-up until completion.
about.p3:
Moria Rodrig, Advocate and Notary, is an experienced legal professional with extensive practice in real estate and civil-commercial law. Over the years, she has developed strong practical expertise in handling complex property transactions, while providing precise legal solutions tailored to each client’s needs.

Her office provides comprehensive legal support for real estate transactions from preliminary due diligence, through negotiation and contract drafting, and up to final registration with the Land Registry.

Moria has unique expertise in representing foreign residents and regularly advises clients from Israel and abroad in real estate matters, notarial documentation, and cross-border legal procedures, with multilingual service delivered efficiently and accurately, including remote handling where required.

In addition, her office handles wills, enduring powers of attorney, commercial agreements, and full notarial services in accordance with applicable regulations, with consistent emphasis on professionalism, availability, and personal guidance throughout the process.

Beyond her legal practice, Moria is active in public service and serves as Chair of the Association of Belgian Immigrants in Israel, and as a municipal representative in the Reservists’ Wives Forum, reflecting a deep commitment to community and social resilience.

Moria believes in combining legal precision, strategic thinking, and personal service, and accompanies her clients with confidence and transparency until the optimal result is achieved.
